attributes.action: Ensure basic numeracy among those standing for public office and reporting their deeds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lobbyists are able to get away with murder when those holding public office lack the numeracy skills to keep the wool out of their eyes and not be blinded by reams of figures. Equally, Ministers (through the ministrations their numerate advisers) are able to pull the wool over the eyes of reporters when the latter lack basic numeracy, accounting and analysis skills.

This can be rectified by a simple examination, producing a star rating system to be appended to ballot papers and reporters' bylines.
